name: Galactic Groove (FerroEverhardus, NielsxD, Veomix, Lord_Vizenco, Voodoodoo)
name_original: Galactic Groove (FerroEverhardus, NielsxD, Veomix, Lord_Vizenco, Voodoodoo)
description:
My team and I created a new unique controller and a game that goes with it.

You are the single best DJ in the whole universe. So good in fact that your music can be heard throughout the vacuum of space. Another DJ alien species is jealous of your music. Use your music to defend yourself from these aliens and make sure they go out with a bang.

for this game we created a controller with wich the game can't be played without nor should this controller be usefull for any other game.

Our unique controller is a DJ instrument with 2 rotating discs.

U use these discs to rotate the 2 music boxes that create your shield in Galagtic Groove. Size your shield correctly the block your oponents projectile's.
